Name: Ice Cream Fantasy
About the game: Ice Cream Fantasy is a puzzle game, in which all you need is to drag bricks, in order to make the pictures restored. But please remember, this game is aiming to make you relax and enjoy life. After finishing the puzzle you will be able to see the full image in the gallery.
